entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , St. Peter's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 01:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: S 29 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain or snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow before morning. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
